name: Entries Importing for Gravity Forms
author: VIA Studio

sections.description:
Do you struggle sharing data between two separate Gravity Forms? The VIA Entries Importing For Gravity Forms plugin will help you transition data from one form to another with ease!

The VIA Entries Importing For Gravity Forms gives users ability to automate import/export entries between separate Gravity Forms. Simply map the form fields from one form to another and let the plugin do the rest of the work! Additionally, data can be shared between two forms that may not necessarily have the same form fields.

Spend less time switching between spreadsheets and .csv files trying to manually manage your form data and instead let the VIA Entries Importing For Gravity Forms plugin do the work for you!

Plugin Setup

Once you’ve installed and activated the plugin, go to Gravity Forms and then Settings to enter a license key (if you have one). Otherwise, there is no additional setup required.

Importing and Exporting

To import or export a form, go to Gravity Forms and then Import/Export. At that point, click on the option that you would like and you will either map fields or choose the fields that you want exported.
sections.faq:
Where can I find the complete documentation?

https://viastudioplugins.com/plugin/entries-importing-for-forms
